name: Cinderella: The Original Fairy Tale
overview: Cinderella: A poor but beautiful young girl wins the heart of a prince with a little help from her fairy Godmother. Cinderella, too poorly dressed to go to the royal ball, can only stay home and weep, until her fairy Godmother provides her with a magnificent dress and magical coach to take her to the palace The story of how kind-hearted Cinderella gets the better of her selfish step-sisters is a classic that generations of adults and children have enjoyed. The Docis Book brings this favorite fairy tale is life. You can ask the CDTV to "read" your favorite passages, to explain or pronounce unfamiliar words, and even to identify objects in the accompanying pictures. The parent the teacher or the reader can easily customize the Discis Books experience The wide range of built in educational options includes music and sound effects to enhance reader appreciation, and second language audio background. For ages 9 years and older
